title: Political and social reform Russia 18th century

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the methods and degrees of success of Russian political and social reform from the period of Peter the Great (1689–1725) through Catherine the Great (1762–1796).

frqParts.text:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the methods and degrees of success of Russian political and social reform from the period of Peter the Great (1689–1725) through Catherine the Great (1762–1796).

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
